law.catch_line: Vehicular traffic approaching a nonfunctioning traffic control signal at an intersection shall:...
law.text:
Vehicular traffic approaching a nonfunctioning traffic control signal at an intersection shall:
Stop:
At a clearly marked stop line;
If there is no clearly marked stop line, before entering any crosswalk; or
If there is no clearly marked stop line or crosswalk, before entering the intersection;
Yield to any vehicle or pedestrian in the intersection; and
Remain stopped until it is safe to enter and continue through the intersection.
